questionTitle: Jackie Robinson, <u><font color='red'>whose</font></u> joined the Brooklyn Dodgers in 1947, <u><font color='red'>was</font></u> the first black American <u><font color='red'>to play</font></u> baseball in <u><font color='red'>the</font></u> major leagues.

He enjoyed the dessert so much that he accepted a second ________ when it was offered .
He put a ________ against the tree and climbed up to pick the apples.
